item.title: No fluff introduction to Java
item.description: About Java Generally, Java refers to these 3 things; A programming language A set of built-in libraries and technology frameworks A virtual machine. Developers affectionately refer to this as the runtime environment. You may hear some people call this by another name like JRE (Java Runtime Environment) or JVM (Java Virtual Machine). It’s all the same. In this book, I may refer to it as simply “runtime” Some tidbits of info about Java;
